entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who is explaining the place to his friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's, who has finally been convinced that what they are doing is right after seeing hundreds of books.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of Harry's friends, who arrives at the place along with others.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a friend of Harry's, who arrives at the place and is impressed by it.
